trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>事件时的更新按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 在控件内单击时，之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件更新记录。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as HTML-encoding the values of a record before updating it in the data source, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这允许您提供的事件处理程序执行的自定义的例程，如 HTML 编码之前更新数据源中发生此事件时的某个记录的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control and to indicate whether the update operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理程序，可用于确定发送到的可选命令参数的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制和以指示是否更新应取消操作。

trans-unit.source: To determine the value of the command argument, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定命令自变量的值，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the update operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消更新操作，请设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can also read or modify the new values entered by the user by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以读取或修改通过使用由用户输入的新值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property contains the key fields, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property contains the non-key fields.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>属性包含的键字段，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>属性包含非键字段。

trans-unit.source: If you need to access the original non-key field values, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要访问非键字段的原始值，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs> class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs> 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> 构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs> object passed to the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> event to validate the values entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>事件，以便验证用户输入的值。

trans-unit.source: An optional command argument passed to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控件的可选命令参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs>类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs>类。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: The value of the `commandArgument` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `commandArgument` 参数的值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: 在引发事件时，将主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the command argument for the update operation passed to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取传递给 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控件的更新操作命令参数。

trans-unit.source: The command argument for the update operation passed to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控件的更新操作命令参数。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property to determine the value of the command argument passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>属性来确定命令自变量的值传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the key field name/value pairs for the record to update.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字典，其中包含要更新的记录的键字段名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> that contains a dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the record to update.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" />，其中包含要更新的记录的键字段名称/值对的字典。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property to access the values of the key fields for the record to update.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>属性来访问要更新的记录的键字段的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用这些值来记录更新的记录。

trans-unit.source: This property contains only the key fields.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含仅的键字段。

trans-unit.source: To access the updated and original non-key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的更新和原始的非键字段，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>属性，分别。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>属性返回的对象实现<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>接口。

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the fields of the record to update.
trans-unit.target: 对象包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>表示要更新的记录的字段的对象。

trans-unit.source: As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的索引器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>直接对象访问该字段值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property to access the value of the key field for the record being updated.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>属性来访问要更新的记录的键字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the new field name/value pairs for the record to update.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含要插入的记录所对应的字段名/值对的字典。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> that contains a dictionary of the new field name/value pairs for the record to update.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" />，它包含要更新的记录的新字段名称/值对的字典。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property to access the new field values for the record to update.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>属性来访问要更新的记录的新字段值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用这些值来记录更新的记录。

trans-unit.source: This property does not contain the key fields.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不包含的键字段。

trans-unit.source: To access the key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的键字段，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also access the original field values by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以通过访问字段的原始值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>属性返回的对象实现<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>接口。

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the fields of the record to update.
trans-unit.target: 对象包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>表示要更新的记录的字段的对象。

trans-unit.source: As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的索引器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>直接对象访问该字段值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property to access the new values entered by the user for the non-key fields of the record being updated.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>属性来访问用于非键字段所更新的记录的用户输入的新值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the original field name/value pairs for the record to update.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字典，其中包含要更新的记录的原始字段名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> that contains a dictionary of the original field name/value pairs for the record to update.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" />，它包含要更新的记录的原始字段名称/值对的字典。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property to access the original field values for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>属性来访问已更新记录的原始字段值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用这些值来记录更新的记录。

trans-unit.source: This property does not contain the key fields.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不包含的键字段。

trans-unit.source: To access the key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的键字段，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also access the new field values entered by the user by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以访问通过使用由用户输入新字段值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>属性返回的对象实现<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>接口。

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the fields of the record to update.
trans-unit.target: 对象包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>表示要更新的记录的字段的对象。

trans-unit.source: As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的对象的索引器直接访问的字段值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property to access the original values of the non-key fields for the record being updated.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>属性来访问要更新的记录的非键字段的原始值。
